UpdateData.ReleaseNotes:
Contributors for this release: Halil
♦ Added support for DisableDropSound filter block items ♦ Added support for GemLevel filter block items ♦ Added support for HasExplicitMod filter block items ♦ Added support for StackSize filter block items ♦ Added support for CustomAlertSound filter block items ♦ Added support for MinimapIcon filter block items ♦ Added support for MapTier filter block items ♦ Added support for PlayEffect filter block items ♦ Added theme support for several filter blocks ♦ Added collapse/expand support for sections ♦ Added support for performing actions on whole sections (copy/move/delete etc) ♦ Added search box to Section Browser ♦ Improved parsing to support different syntaxes ♦ Small bugfixes
